import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Link from "next/link"; import { useRouter } from "next/router"; import { Row, Col, Image, Tag, Skeleton, Space } from "antd"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import moment from "moment"; import { dummy } from "../../../utils/dummy"; import CharacterCard from "../../../components/common/CharacterCard"; import LocationCard from "../../../components/common/LocationCard"; import { getStory } from "../../../redux/actions/storiesActions"; const Story = ({ getStory, story, loading }) => { const router = useRouter(); // useEffect(() => { // setTimeout(() => { // setLoading(false); // }, 3000); // }, []); useEffect(() => { getStory(router.query.id); }, []); console.log(story); return (
{!loading && ( <>

by{" "} {story.authorName}

Category:{" "} Drama
Language: {story.language}
Status: {story.status}
Copyright: {story.copyright}
Cover Copyright: {story.imageCopyright}
Mature content: {story.mature ? "YES" : "NO"}

Tags

#drama #biography #romance #history #bestseller
)} <> {loading && ( )}

); }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ story: state.stories.story, loading: state.stories.loading, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, { getStory })(Story);
